void FLASH_BranchCacheCmd ( ControlStatus  NewState)

Enable or Disable FLASH branch cache.

Parameters:
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE
Return values:
None

Definition at line 188 of file ht32f5xxxx_flash.c.

void FLASH_ClearIntFlag ( u32  FLASH_FLAG_x)

Clear specific interrupt flags of FLASH.

Parameters:
FLASH_FLAG_x,:interrupt flag of FLASH. This parameter can be any combination (|) of the following values:
  • FLASH_FLAG_OREF
  • FLASH_FLAG_IOCMF
  • FLASH_FLAG_OBEF
  • FLASH_FLAG_ITADF
  • FLASH_FLAG_ORFF
Return values:
None

Definition at line 406 of file ht32f5xxxx_flash.c.

FLASH_State FLASH_EraseOptionByte ( void  )

Erase FLASH Option Byte page.

Return values:
FLASH_State
  • FLASH_COMPLETE
  • FLASH_TIME_OUT
  • FLASH_ERR_WRITE_PROTECTED
Note:
HSI must keep turn on when doing the Flash operation (Erase/Program).

Definition at line 249 of file ht32f5xxxx_flash.c.

FLASH_State FLASH_ErasePage ( u32  PageAddress)

Erase a specific FLASH page.

Parameters:
PageAddress,:Address of the erased page.
Return values:
FLASH_State
  • FLASH_COMPLETE
  • FLASH_TIME_OUT
  • FLASH_ERR_WRITE_PROTECTED
  • FLASH_ERR_ADDR_OUT_OF_RANGE
Note:
HSI must keep turn on when doing the Flash operation (Erase/Program).

Definition at line 230 of file ht32f5xxxx_flash.c.

FlagStatus FLASH_GetIntStatus ( u32  FLASH_FLAG_x)

Return flag status of the FLASH interrupt.

Parameters:
FLASH_FLAG_x,:Flag of the FLASH interrupt. This parameter can be any combination (|) of the following values:
  • FLASH_FLAG_OREF
  • FLASH_FLAG_IOCMF
  • FLASH_FLAG_OBEF
  • FLASH_FLAG_ITADF
  • FLASH_FLAG_ORFF
  • FLASH_FLAG_PPEF
  • FLASH_FLAG_RORFF
Return values:
FlagStatus
  • SET
  • RESET

void FLASH_IntConfig ( u32  FLASH_INT_x,
ControlStatus  Cmd 
)

Enable or Disable the specific FLASH interrupts.

Parameters:
FLASH_INT_x,:The specific FLASH interrupt. This parameter can be any combination (|) of the following values:
  • FLASH_INT_ORFIEN
  • FLASH_INT_ITADIEN
  • FLASH_INT_OBEIEN
  • FLASH_INT_IOCMIEN
  • FLASH_INT_OREIEN
  • FLASH_INT_ALL
Cmd,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE
Return values:
None

FLASH_State FLASH_ProgramWordData ( u32  Address,
u32  Data 
)

Program one word data.

Parameters:
Address,:The specific FLASH address to be programmed.
Data,:The specific FLASH data to be programmed.
Return values:
FLASH_State
  • FLASH_COMPLETE
  • FLASH_TIME_OUT
  • FLASH_ERR_WRITE_PROTECTED
  • FLASH_ERR_ADDR_OUT_OF_RANGE
Note:
HSI must keep turn on when doing the Flash operation (Erase/Program).

void FLASH_SetRemappingMode ( FLASH_Vector  FLASH_BOOT_x)

Set vector remapping mode.

Parameters:
FLASH_BOOT_x,:Booting mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • FLASH_BOOT_LOADER : Boot loader mode
  • FLASH_BOOT_MAIN : Main FLASH mode
Return values:
None

Definition at line 212 of file ht32f5xxxx_flash.c.

void FLASH_SetWaitState ( u32  FLASH_WAITSTATE_n)

Configure the FLASH wait state.

Parameters:
FLASH_WAITSTATE_n,:Setting of FLASH wait state. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • FLASH_WAITSTATE_0 : zero wait state
  • FLASH_WAITSTATE_1 : one wait state
  • FLASH_WAITSTATE_2 : two wait state
Return values:
None

Definition at line 142 of file ht32f5xxxx_flash.c.

FLASH_State FLASH_WaitForOperationEnd ( void  )

Wait untill the FLASH operation has finished or time-out has occurred.

Return values:
FLASH_State
  • FLASH_COMPLETE
  • FLASH_TIME_OUT
  • FLASH_ERR_WRITE_PROTECTED
  • FLASH_ERR_ADDR_OUT_OF_RANGE
Note:
HSI must keep turn on when doing the Flash operation (Erase/Program).
